text: Park Jong-won (born 20 October 1960) is a South Korean film director and screenwriter. == Filmography == *Kuro Arirang (1989) *Our Twisted Hero (1992) *The Eternal Empire (1994) *Seven Reasons Why Beer Is Better Than a Lover (1996) *Rainbow Trout (1999) *Paradise Villa (2001) == Awards == *1992 13th Blue Dragon Film Awards: Best Director (Our Twisted Hero) *1995 33rd Grand Bell Awards: Best Director (The Eternal Empire) == References == == External links == * * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean film directors Category:South Korean screenwriters
title: Park Jong-won (director)
